duties_responsibilities.duty: Customizing and configuring the NetSuite platform to align with business processes and requirements
Developing and enhancing SuiteScripts to automate business processes, create complex workflows, and integrate NetSuite with other systems
Creating custom fields, forms, records, workflows, and reports
Integrating NetSuite with external systems such as CRM, e-commerce platforms, and third-party applications, using SuiteTalk, REST, or other integration methods
Managing data migration and data import/export processes, ensuring accuracy of data in NetSuite
Working directly with project team and client to define and prioritize work
Contributing to continuous improvement and development of our processes and intellectual property

education_certification.credential: BS or BA degree in Finance, Accounting, Business, Technology, Information Systems, or equivalent degree
